title: A Magical Arrangement
description: Could an arranged marriage lead to two people saving the world? Caspian is on a mission; go to the human realm, form an alliance, and stop the rifts popping up in the fae and human realm. The only problem? Caspian has to play by human customs which involves an alliance through marriage, and to make matters worse, he and his husband-to-be haven’t started off on the right foot.Ash was raised a prince but his heart always longed to be adventuring. With rifts opening in his realm, and his new fae husband by his side, Ash will finally get to live that dream. But will magic, evil creatures, spreading darkness, and budding feelings be too big of a distraction for Ash to handle? A Magical Arrangement is a 34k word arranged marriage story between a fae and a human. Inside you’ll find magic, adventure, mpreg, and of course, a happily ever after.
author: Toby Wise
